title: Software Engineer
description: A software engineer designs, develops, and maintains software systems and applications.

skills.name: Programming
skills.description: Ability to write clean, efficient, and maintainable code in various programming languages.

skills.name: Problem Solving
skills.description: Ability to analyze complex problems and develop effective solutions.

skills.name: Version Control
skills.description: Proficiency in using Git or other version control systems.

requirements.education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Focuses on building user interfaces and client-side functionality.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Focuses on server-side logic, databases, and application architecture.

title: Data Scientist
description: A data scientist extracts insights from complex data using statistical analysis, machine learning, and data visualization.

skills.name: Statistical Analysis
skills.description: Ability to apply statistical methods to analyze data and draw conclusions.

skills.name: Machine Learning
skills.description: Knowledge of machine learning algorithms and their applications.

skills.name: Data Visualization
skills.description: Ability to create clear, informative visualizations to communicate findings.

requirements.education: Master's degree or PhD in Statistics, Computer Science, or related field
requirements.experience: 3+ years of experience in data analysis or related role
certifications: Optional: IBM Data Science Professional Certificate

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.description: Builds and deploys machine learning models in production environments.

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Analyzes data to provide actionable insights for business decisions.

title: Network Administrator
description: A network administrator is responsible for maintaining computer networks and resolving issues with them.

skills.name: Network Configuration
skills.description: Ability to set up and configure network equipment and infrastructure.

skills.name: Troubleshooting
skills.description: Ability to diagnose and resolve network issues quickly and effectively.

skills.name: Security Management
skills.description: Knowledge of network security protocols and best practices.

requirements.education: Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, or related field
requirements.experience: 2+ years of experience in network administration

jobs.title: Network Security Specialist
jobs.description: Focuses on protecting network infrastructure from security threats.

jobs.title: System Administrator
jobs.description: Manages and maintains computer systems and servers.
